name: Salomon
description:
Salomon is a globally renowned brand specializing in outdoor sports equipment and apparel. Founded in 1947 in the heart of the French Alps, Salomon has a rich heritage of innovation and craftsmanship. The brand is best known for its cutting-edge technologies in skiing, trail running, hiking, and other outdoor activities.

Salomon's product range includes high-performance footwear, skis, snowboards, apparel, and gear designed for adventure enthusiasts and professional athletes. With a strong focus on quality, durability, and sustainability, Salomon continues to lead the market in providing solutions for both casual outdoor lovers and elite adventurers.
